children.text: Destroy prev map element meant to be placed (to be sure)

actions.text: Finish creating old object and make a new one

events.text: Rotate selected object with mouse wheel
Add new road segment and snap it this instant

actions.text: If element was moved during edit, get it back where it was to delete correctly
Disable redo button, since there is nothing to redo

events.text:
Saving project format:
1. Number of segments that form the track
2. Track segments - starting from finish/start segment till ending segment
3. All other objects on top of that

children.name: error
children.comment: Boolean to check whether should we abort saving map

children.text: Start assuming we have a complete circle track

children.name: complete_track
children.comment: Boolean to check whether  or not we have a complete track built

children.name: next_id
children.comment: UID of the next segment to add

children.text: Actually save the map if all good
